entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 4:00 PM CDT Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow with visibilities at times less than 2 kilometres overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow with visibilities frequently less than 1 kilometre early in the evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 16 May 2016
